As a 2024 report from the Center for Strategic and International  Studies plainly put it: ``Should any one country dominate the  commercial remote sensing market, not only could it gain economic  advantages, but it would also control the information narrative about  the entire planet, from the environment to natural resources to human  conflict.''

So this bill provides Congress the transparency and insight we need  to oversee the licensing and regulation of private remote sensing  systems.
title: Commercial Remote Sensing Amendment Act of 2025
